parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Throws an exception. The exception is processed by first [[catch]] block. This command will terminate further execution of the code.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Avoid using alternative shorthand syntax if you are planning on preparing your exception information dynamically, as it will have to be generated first regardless of the condition of the [[if]] statement before it, as shown in Example 3.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[throw]] expression

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> expression: [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> if (condition) [[throw]] exception <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.53.133045</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> if (condition): [[If Type]]  - if (condition) returns [[true]], "exception" is thrown
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> exception: [[Anything]] - value that will be put into ''_exception'' variable inside [[catch]] block

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[try]] {[[throw]] "invalid argument"} [[catch]] {[[hint]] [[str]] _exception};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.53.133045</value></part></template>: <code>123 [[try]] {[[if]] (_this != 123) [[throw]] "invalid argument"} [[catch]] {[[hint]] [[str]] _exception};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> The correct usage of shorthand alt syntax: <code>[[try]] {
	[[if]] (a > b) [[throw]] "Error: some error"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>OK</value></part></template>
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>The command argument is static</value></part></template>
} [[catch]] {
	[[hint]] [[str]] _exception;
};

[[try]] {
	_someFunc = {
		.....
	};
	[[if]] (a > b) [[throw]] ([[call]] _someFunc); <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>NOT OK</value></part></template>
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>The command argument is dynamic</value></part></template>
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_someFunc is called first to get the value regardless of (a > b) outcome</value></part></template>
} [[catch]] {
	[[hint]] [[str]] _exception;
};

[[try]] {
	_someFunc = {
		.....
	};
	[[if]] (a > b) [[then]] {[[throw]] ([[call]] _someFunc)}; /// OK
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>The command argument is dynamic</value></part></template>
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_someFunc is only called when (a > b) is [[true]]</value></part></template>
} [[catch]] {
	[[hint]] [[str]] _exception;
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Exception handling]], [[try]], [[catch]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
